title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3796/87 of 17 December 1987 amending Regulation (EEC) No 4110/86 fixing, for the 1987 fishing year, the overall foreseeable level of imports for the products subject to the supplementary trade mechanism in the fisheries sector
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3796/87
of 17 December 1987
amending Regulation (EEC) No 4110/86 fixing, for the 1987 fishing year, the overall foreseeable level of imports for the products subject to the supplementary trade mechanism in the fisheries sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the table in part A of the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 4110/86 for the level of imports of venus clams, fresh or chilled, falling within Common Customs Tariff subheading 03.03 B IV b) ex 2, '33 685' is replaced by '33 952'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 December 1987.
For the Commission
Antรณnio CARDOSO E CUNHA
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1986, p. 30.
(2) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1986, p. 28.
(3) See page 39 of this Official Journal.
